caption:
AI is revolutionizing how we work, enhancing productivity and innovation. Yet, 52% of people using AI for crucial tasks hesitate to admit it. Is it trust issues, concerns about job security, or the stigma of relying on technology? While some embrace AI’s potential, others hold back. 

What’s driving this reluctance? Share your thoughts below! 

#Emeritus #AI #WorkplaceInnovation #Technology #TechAdoption
